name: Kombinator
description:
Player is given list of starting values and by using arithmetic operations it should create desired result. All values and operations are in 3D space however, player can see only from 2D perspective. Exception is when rotating, where briefly can take a peek how values and operations are structured in 3D environment.

Map can be seen from 4 sides (perspectives).

There are 10 levels (use number keys from 1 to 9 to load them directly).

Keymap

  • A or Left (Rotate to lo left)
  • D or Right (Rotate to lo right)
  • from 1 to 9 (Level loading)

Math operations:

  • Num + (Add)
  • Num - (Subtract)
  • Num * (Multiply)
  • Num 2 (Power of 2)
  • Num 0 or P (Power)
  • Num . or E (extends output)

Mouse usage:

Click on light green field to add selected operation.

Click on already placed operation to remove it.

Known issue: sometimes weird block positioning occurs on non-front side (perspective) and this can cause incorrect calculation
